reviewText: My 2 year old and 3 year old grandsons love this DVD.They particapate in helping solve all the chores.Good price too.
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: My boys (3 and 5) love Team Umizoomi and honestly they are learning so much from the show that I don't mind them watching it.  They teach patterns, numbers, colors and it is done is such a fun way that they don't realize their learning!  "Umigames" is a DVD that features its main episode being an Olympics of sorts for Team Umizoomi.  It was the perfect episode to get my boys thinking about summer sports!  Next up is three more episodes with more Team Umizoomi fun!  It is an hour and a half and perfect to watch all the way through or an episode here and there.  I don't think we have any other Team Umizoomi DVDs so this is perfect for them since we have lots of downtime this summer!
summary: Cute and fun with summer sports!
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: If you buy the series do not rent or buy this, its a cluster of the shows.  Made the big mistake of buying it just to find out I already purchased the show.....so total waste of money... Amazon did refund my money after my complaint, which was awesome, but my 3 yr old hit purchase after he seen it again!
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: Our son really enjoys all the Team Umizoomi . The Dvd's shows are a great way to help show you child about colors, shapes and patterns.  Thanks Amazon for the variety of dvd's on Team Umizoomi the great buys and the quality of the dvd's were great.
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: Team Umizoomi is a big hit at our house because both my 5 year old and 2 year old really enjoy it. The DVD features a new episode called the Umigames, it's a nice Olympics themed episode and one my kids hadn't seen yet. Also included are three older episodes: Boardwalk Games, Carnival, and Crazy Skates (which my 2 year old loves). Team Umizoomi is the only show on Nick Jr which still holds my 5 year olds' attention. I'm not much for justifying my children's tv time by calling it "educational" but there are REAL math skills to be learned on this show, from counting by 10's to pattern recognition. I'm super happy with this DVD.
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: My 3 year old granddaughter sang along and answered  the questions about shapes. She is learning trapezoids!  This cartoon features geometrical shapes, vocabulary of sports, and encourages healthy competition (not giving up even if you start last).I liked it especially for the subtle cultural exposure to Japanese outlook.
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: Kiddo loves her some umizoomi and bought this on prime via roku with a credit. It's a bit sporty, but it's pretty easygoing (some are a bit stressful with OH NOs everywhere!). It's basically three episodes in a row and were easy to put on when traveling. We save it for travel and haven't needed to buy the dvd. She doesn't ask for it like some others.
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: My 14 month old grandson loves team umizoomi & so do I. We watch it together so I bought episodes to watch on the go.
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: My granddaughter is hooked and now watches more of Umizoomi than Mickey.  This is a Christmas present for car trips.TC
Title: Team Umizoomi: Umigames

reviewText: As much as my 2 y.o loves Team Umizoomi, for some reason he watches this one less than all of is other DVDs. He hasn't said that he doesn't like it but it's not in heavy rotation.
